When hot soup was served in a cup during dinner, an engineer was so eager to drink it. Since it was hot, he added cubes of ice to cool the soup and stirred it. He noticed that dew starts to form on the outermost surface of the cup. He wanted to check the temperature of the outermost surface of the cup. What is this temperature equal to?
choices: Equal to air's dew point temperature
answer: Equal to air's dew point temperature
